item.title: Getting Started
item.description: We quickly show you how to log in, and a few other pointers. Click on the subsections to read further. Logging In, and Browsers. Log into the syzygy service by using your home university credentials or Google credentials. Currently, the following sites are up and running: https://sfu.syzygy.ca Simon Fraser University https://ubc.syzygy.ca University of British Columbia https://ucalgary.syzygy.ca University of Calgary https://uleth.syzygy.ca University of Lethbridge https://usask.syzygy.ca University of Saskatchewan https://utoronto.syzygy.ca University of Toronto https://uvic.
